article_title: Denver police searching for man who robbed UMB Bank on Wednesday – The Denver Post
article_text:
Police in Denver are asking for the public’s help in identifying a man captured on surveillance cameras robbing a bank on Wednesday morning.

The man robbed the UMB Bank on the 6900 block of East Hampden Avenue about 11 a.m, police said.

The suspect threatened that he had a weapon and bomb, demanding cash before he left.

Anyone with information on the bank robbery or the suspect is asked to call police in Denver.

Jesse Paul: 303-954-1733, jpaul@denverpost.com or twitter.com/JesseAPaul
